update.title: Thrust plugin refactor

content.raw: One final thing: I thing this should be dropped to DEBUG too. The user really only needs to see if they forgot to set a parameter in the SDF
content.html: One final thing: I thing this should be dropped to DEBUG too. The user really only needs to see if they forgot to set a parameter in the SDF

content.raw:
Thanks to you! I have two extra suggestions:

* Can you fill the doxygen section of the `UsvThrust` where all the plugin parameters are described?
* Can you add a note/link about the document that you wrote describing the math behind the plugin? I think it will help a lot to understand the code and make future contributions.

‌
content.html:
Thanks to you! I have two extra suggestions:

  • Can you fill the doxygen section of the UsvThrust where all the plugin parameters are described?
  • Can you add a note/link about the document that you wrote describing the math behind the plugin? I think it will help a lot to understand the code and make future contributions.

‌

content.raw:
Should be good to go, but would like an independent test before merging.

@caguero thanks for making adding all the hints and cleaning up on the sloppy code!

update.title: Thrust refactor

content.raw: Should drop this to DEBUG level
I notice that even with the throttle this log is pretty spam-ey. Might be better to just track a timedout/not timedout state and log on change
content.html: I notice that even with the throttle this log is pretty spam-ey. Might be better to just track a timedout/not timedout state and log on change

content.raw: Gazebo ROS plugins should not call ros::init themselves, this is already done by the gazebo\_ros\_api plugin loaded automatically.
content.html: Gazebo ROS plugins should not call ros::init themselves, this is already done by the gazebo_ros_api plugin loaded automatically.
